connection_draining_timeout.description: The time in seconds to allow for connections to drain

idle_timeout.description: The time in seconds that the connection is allowed to be idle

instances.description: List of instances ID to place in the ELB pool

internal.description: If true, ELB will be an internal ELB

number_of_instances.description: Number of instances to attach to ELB

security_groups.description: A list of security group IDs to assign to the ELB

subnets.description: A list of subnet IDs to attach to the ELB

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource
